title: 16 rp short for arcade riven
body: is there a way i could get 16 rp im short 16 rp for arcade riven and all my cards are maxed ><

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=euATMA5i,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-08T22:53:55.587+0000)
>
> 16 RP eh? Hmmm.. We may be able to work something out if you reach out in a [support ticket.
> ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^

Don't want to be a buzzkillington here but you should definitely know the implications of something as seemingly small as this. I'm sure there's a reason the skin is however much RP, and selling it for anything less is saying that it's not really worth what you posted it for.

I hear what you're saying and you aren't entirely wrong, but the big thing hear is that unlike real world currency rp can only be obtained in set amounts, so the difference of a few cents in real life become 5 dollars, and Riot's not looking to be like that to their customers and so from what I've seen will generally give players who put in support tickets for things like this the extra few rp they need to obtain them. Yes, there may be implications as you put it having to do with devaluing their product but honestly that's a very overcritical view of what is simply a player asking for a little help. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
